Class: AudioMessage

AudioMessage

A message which contains a downloadable audio file

Constructor

new AudioMessage(message, API)

Creates a new AudioMessage object
Parameters:
Name Type Description
message Object A raw message object from an update
API BotAPI An instance of a BotAPI from teleapiwrapper which will be used to do stuff with this message
Source:
  • message_types/audio_message.js, line 18

Extends

  • FileMessage

Members

(readonly) audio :Object

The Audio object this message contains
Type:
  • Object
Properties:
Name Type Attributes Description
file_id String ID of the audio file
duration Integer Duration of the audio file
performer String <optional>
 The performer of the audio file
title String <optional>
 Title of the audio
mime_type String <optional>
 Mime type of the audio
file_size Integer <optional>
 Size of the audio, in bytes
Source:
  • message_types/audio_message.js, line 44

Methods

getFile() → {Promise}

Downloads the file and puts it in a buffer. Be careful about using this method with large files
Inherited From:
  • FileMessage#getFile
Source:
  • message_types/file_message.js, line 91
Returns:
A promise which resolves with a buffer containing the file when the file is downloaded
Type
Promise

getFileStream() → {Promise}

Gets a http stream to the file
Inherited From:
  • FileMessage#getFileStream

  • message_types/file_message.js, line 113
Returns:
A promise which resolves with a stream containing the file

Promise
